text: (ihalōkadalli) nāvu avarige kelavu saṅgātigaḷannu nēmisiruvevu. Avaru, avara mundiruva hāgū hindiruva ellavannū avarige candagāṇisikoḍuttāre. Avara virud'dha hāgū avariginta hinde badukidda jinn hāgū mānava samudāyagaḷa virud'dha (allāhana) mātu anuṣṭhānavāgi biṭṭitu. Avaru khaṇḍita naṣṭa anubhavisuvavarāgiddaru
